resources.string: You draw and we will try to guess !!

Hi! Welcome to Digit Recognizer. This app an Artificial Intelligence class project. The app is simple in it\'s concept but rather intriguing.

When you click the button Try it out from the main menu you\'ll be taken to a canvas where you can draw out a digit from 0 do 9. After you are done, click Solve and the app will try to recognize the digit using a neuron network that has been trained on a significant data set of 10000 images of handwritten digits. Make sure you are connected to the internet when using the app as it uses it to communicate with our server.

We hope you will have fun and we hope that this app makes you want to research more about AI, neuron networks and image processing.

This app was created by Denis SelimoviÄ‡ & Lamija Vrnjak at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering of Sarajevo.
